subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
Colleges and Universities
organizations: National Collegiate Basketball Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bartow began the athletic program at the University of Alabama, Birmingham, in 1977, coached at six universities, and was inducted into the National Collegiate Basketball Hall of Fame in 2009.
snippet: Mr. Bartow began the athletic program at the University of Alabama, Birmingham, in 1977, coached at six universities, and was inducted into the National Collegiate Basketball Hall of Fame in 2009.
